query:
SELECT 
  ii.environment_name,
  ii.id as item_id,
  COUNT(ist.id) as total_steps,
  GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(ist.step_order, ':', ist.step_name) ORDER BY ist.step_order) as steps_detail
FROM inspection_items ii
LEFT JOIN installation_steps ist ON ii.id = ist.inspection_item_id
GROUP BY ii.id, ii.environment_name
ORDER BY ii.environment_name;
